alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:21PM MDT until July 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CAMPBELL COUNTY... At 721 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Echeta to 2 miles northwest of Gillette Airport to 9 miles west of Gillette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gillette, Camplex Event Facility and Gillette Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 112 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
